game.name: ITORAH
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Itorah는 이상한 곳에 혼자 남겨진 인간을 플레이하는 2D 액션 플랫포머입니다. 탐험하고, 싸우고, 생존해 과거를 알아내고 가장 큰 위협인 알 수 없는 역병으로부터 이 세계를 구하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discover the world of Nahucan in this 2D action platformer. You are Itorah, the only human in this strange place. Explore, fight and survive to uncover your past and save Nahucan from its biggest threat, a mysterious plague!

reviewHighlights.text: A fun exploratory platformer with an interesting setting. It's not particularly difficult either, which may or may not be a plus depending on your pla...
The game itself is actually kinda "meh", but good enough to let me finish it, so I would give it a positive recommendation. Like the top comment said,...
